Row.Text: Unique Building
Academy
+4 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Has 3 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex slots. Antiquity Science Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] Has 3 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex slots.
Altar

+3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Provides benefits and [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses based on your chosen [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Pantheon. Antiquity Happiness Building. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
[B]Effect:[/B] Provides benefits and [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses based on your chosen [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Pantheon.[n]Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Amphitheater
+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Antiquity Culture Building. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
[B]Effect:[/B] +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] towards [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
Ancient Bridge

+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Pillaged by any Flood. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Pillaged by any Flood.[N]Must be placed on a Navigable River. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Ancient Walls

Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Antiquity Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or on the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.[n]Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or on the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Arena
+4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Antiquity Happiness Building. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters.
[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters.

+3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Antiquity Military Building. Land Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
[B]Effect:[/B] Land Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]towards Land Units.

+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

Fishing Quay

+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Fishing Boats. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Must be placed on Coast, a Lake tile, or a Navigable River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] on Fishing Boats in this Settlement from its [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE]Warehouse Bonus.[n]Must be placed on Coast, a Lake tile, or a Navigable River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

Naval Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Must be placed on Coast, a Lake tile, or a Navigable River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

Egyptian Unique Building.
Mortuary Temple
Egyptian Unique Gold Building. +3[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Wonders. Ageless.
Egyptian Unique Building.

Parthenon

Greek Unique Culture Building. +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Rough Terrain. +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Wonders. Ageless.
+2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Rough Terrain.[n]Greek Unique Building.

Mauryan Unique Happiness Building. +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Mountains and Wonders. Ageless.

Maya Unique Building.
K'uh Nah
Maya Unique Science Building. +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science if placed on Vegetated Terrain. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Wonders. Ageless.
+2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] if placed on Vegetated Terrain.[n]Maya Unique Building.

Roman Unique Building.
Baray

Khmer Unique Improvement. +3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Floodplains in this Settlement. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement. Improvements, Buildings, and Districts in this Settlement do not get pillaged by floods.

[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] on all Floodplains in this Settlement. Improvements, Buildings, and Districts in this Settlement do not get pillaged by floods.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement.[n]Khmer Unique Improvement.
Great Wall

Han Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for adjacent Great Wall segments. Ageless. Counts as [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification, +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.

[B]Effect:[/B] +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units defending in the tile.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.[n]Han Unique Improvement.
Hawilt

Aksumite Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for adjacent Wonders and other Hawilti. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.[n]Aksumite Unique Improvement.
Pairidaeza

Achaemenid Persian Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Military Units in a Settlement with a Pairidaeza. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Pairidaeza.

[B]Effect:[/B] +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Military Units in a Settlement with a Pairidaeza. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Pairidaeza.[n]Achaemenid Persian Unique Improvement.
Potkop

Mississippian Unique Improvement. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food for each adjacent [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.[n]Mississippian Unique Improvement.
Hillfort

City-State Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:Action_Showall] Sight, and +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing per turn to Military Units on this tile. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Counts as [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification, +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when defending. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Rough Terrain.

[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:Action_Showall] Sight, and +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing per turn to Military Units on this tile. +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units defending in the tile.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Rough Terrain.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Megalith

City-State Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food for every adjacent [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement . Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Emporium

City-State Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities if they have at least one [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Emporium.

[B]Effect:[/B] +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities that have at least one [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Emporium.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Step Pyramid

City-State Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every adjacent River tile. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on tiles with a natural [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] yield.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Yakhchāl

City-State Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms in Desert Terrain in this Settlement. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Desert tile. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Yakhchāl.

[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] on Farms in Desert Terrain in this Settlement.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Desert tile. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Yakhchāl.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Festival Grounds

City-State Unique Improvement. +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Diplomacy and +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Double base yields during [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebrations. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain adjacent to a district. Limited to one per settlement.

[B]Effect:[/B] The base yields of this Improvement are doubled during [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebrations.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain adjacent to a district. Limited to one per settlement.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Acropolis

Greek Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Odeon and Parthenon in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Parthenon for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_LOGIOS] Logios in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Parthenon for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
Forum

Roman Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Basilica and Temple of Jupiter in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
Matha
Mauryan Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Dharamshala and Vihara in the same District. +10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement.
+10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement.
Necropolis

Egyptian Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Mastaba and Mortuary Temple in the same District. Grants 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold (on Standard Speed) when any [icon:WONDER] Wonder is completed in this Settlement. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_TJATY] Tjaty in this Settlement.
Grants 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold (on Standard Speed) when any [icon:WONDER] Wonder is completed in this Settlement.
Uwaybil K'uh

Maya Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Jalaw and K'uh Nah in the same District. Every time you research a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology, this Settlement gains[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to 5% of its cost.
Every time you research a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology, this Settlement gains[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to 5% of its cost.
